chapter.text: 21|1|Manuhara hicapa-nikacara samaya samipabarti, athaca sihamte udasinatata bimukha hai ache.
21|2|Yetiya'i sihamtara ocarata sihamtara pratipalakara taraphara paraa kono natuna upadesa ahe tetiya sihamte seya kautukacchalata sune
21|3|sihamtara antara thake amanoyogi. Arau yisakala yalima sihamte gopane paraamarsa karae, ‘e'om dekhuna tomalokara darae'i ejana manuha, tathapi'o tomaloke dekhi-suni yadura kabalata paraibane’
21|4|te'om (raachule) ka’le, ‘akasasamuha arau prthiraira sakalo katha'i mora pratipalakara jana ache arau teraemi sarbasraota, sarbajna’.

21|5|Baram sihamte kaya, ‘e'ibora alika kalpana, hayatoba si e'ibora nije'i racana karaiche nahaya si ejana kabi. Naha’le si amara ocarata eta nidarsana lai ahaka yenekai purbarartisakala nidarsanasaha praeraita haichila’.
21|6|Ihamtara purbe yibora janapada ami dhbansa karaicho se'ibora tha'ira adhibasisakala imana posana karaa nachila; tente ihamte imana posana karaibane
21|7|Arau tomara purbe ami ahisaha kerala purausasakalake'i praerana karaichilo; eteke yadi tomaloke najana teneha’le jnanisakalaka sudhi loraa.
21|8|Arau ami te'omlokaka ene kono dehabisista karaa nachilo ye, te'omloke khadya grahana karaa nachila, arau te'omloka ciranjirai'o nachila.
21|9|Tara pichata ami te'omlokara prati karaa pratisrauti satya karai dekhuraalo, phalata ami te'omlokaka arau yisakalaka iccha raksa karaichilo arau simalanghanakarai bilakaka dhbansa karaichilo.
21|10|Arasye ami tomalokara prati kitaba aratirna karaicho ya’ta ache tomalokara bisaye'i alocana, tathapi'o tomaloke nubujibane
21|11|arau ami kimana ye janapada dhbansa karaicho, yara adhibasisakala achila yalima arau sihamtara pichata srsti karaicho ana eta jati
21|12|eteke sihamte yetiya amara sasti aha buli anubhara karaile tetiya'i sihamte tara paraa palayana karaibalai dharaile.

21|13|(Sihamtaka koraa ha’la) ‘palayana nakaraiba, tomaloke ya’ta bhoga-bilasata matta achila se'i tha'ilai arau tomaloke nijara ghara-duraaralai ubhati yoraa, yate e'i bisaye tomalokaka sudhiba paraa yaya’.
21|14|Sihamte ka’le, ‘haya! Durbhagya amara! Niscaya ami yalima achilo’.
21|15|Eteke sihamtara e'i artanada caliye achila yetiyalaike ami sihamtaka da'i niya sasya arau numa'i yoraa ju'ira darae karaa nachilo.
21|16|Akasa-prthirai arau e'i duyora majata yi ache seya ami khela-dhemalira chalerae srsti karaa na'i.
21|17|Khela-dhemalira bastu srsti karaa'i yadi amara abhipraaya ha’lehemtena, tente ami seya amara paraa'i karailohemtena; kintu ami seya karaa na'i.

21|18|Baram ami satyara dbaraa asatyaka aghata karao, phalata i asatyaka curna-bicurna karai diye arau tatksanata asatya nicihna hai yaya, arau tomaloke allahaka yi gunerae akhyayita karaicha seye tomalokara babe ache durbhoga
21|19|Akasasamuha arau prthiraita yi ache se'i sakalo te'omrae'i; arau te'omra sannidhyata yisakala ache te'omloke ahankara karai te'omra ibadatara paraa bimukha nahaya arau birakti bodho nakarae.
21|20|Te'omloke dine-raati te'omrae'i paraitrata arau mahima ghosana karae, te'omloke klanta'o nahaya.
21|21|Sihamte (kaphirasakale) prthiraira paraa yiboraka upasya hicape grahana karaiche se'iborae kono mrtaka jiraita karaibalai saksama ne

21|22|yadi e'i duyora (akasa arau prthiraira) majata allahara bahirae bahu ilaha thakilehemtena, tente ubhaye'i bisrnkhala hai ga’lehemtena. Eteke sihamte yi barnana karae tara paraa arachara adhipati allaha ati paraitra.
21|23|Te'om yi karae se'i bisaye te'om jababadihi naha’ba; baram sihamtake'i prasna karaa ha’ba.

21|24|Sihamte te'omra bahirae bahu ilaha grahana karaiche neki? Koraa, ‘tomalokara pramana lai aha. Mora lagata yi ache e'itorae tara upadesa arau e'itorae upadesa achila mora purbarartisakalara’. Kintu sihamtara bechi bhage'i prakrta satya najane; phalata sihamta mukha ghuraa'i laya.
21|25|Arau tomara purbe ami yi raachulake'i praerana karaicho te'omra ocarata e'itorae'i ahi karaicho ye, ‘mora bahirae ana kono satya ilaha na'i, seye tomaloke kerala morae'i ibadata karaa’.
21|26|Arau sihamte kaya, ‘rahamane (allahe) santana grahana karaiche’. Te'om paraitra mahana! Baram te'omloka te'omra sanmanita banda.
21|27|Te'omloke te'omra agadharai namate; te'omloke kerala te'omra adesa anusarae'i kama karae.

21|28|Te'omlokara sanmukhata arau pichata yi ache se'i sakalo te'om jane. Arau te'omloke chuparaicha karae kerala sihamtara babe'i yisakalara prati te'om santusta arau te'omloke te'omra bhayata bhita santrasta.
21|29|Arau te'omlokara majata yiye ka’ba, ‘allahara bahirae maye'i ilaha’, taka ami jahannamara sastira pratidana dima; e'idarae'i ami yalimasakalaka pratidana di'om.

21|30|Yisakale kupharai karae sihamte dekha na'i neki ye, akasasamuha arau prthirai otapraotabharae milita hai achila, tara pichata ami ubhayaka prthaka karai dilo; arau praanabana sakalo bastuke panira paraa srsti karailo; tathapi'o sihamte imana posana nakaraiba ne
21|31|arau prthiraita ami srsti karaicho sudrrha parbata, yate prthiraiye sihamtaka lai tharaka-baraka nakarae, arau tata ami taiyara karaicho prasasta patha, yate sihamte gantabyasthalata gai paya.
21|32|Arau ami akasaka karaicho suraksita cada; kintu sihamte akasata arasthita nidarsanaralira paraa mukha ghuraa'i laya.
21|33|Arau allahe'i srsti karaiche raati arau dina, surya arau candra; pratyeke'i nija nija kaksapathata bicarana karae.
21|34|Arau ami tomara purbe'o kono manuhaka cirajirai karaa nachilo, gatike yadi tumi mrtyubarana karaa tente sihamte cirajirai hai thakiba neki
21|35|pratito jira'i mrtyura soraada grahana karaiba; ami tomalokaka bhala arau beyara dbaraa bisesabharae paraiksa karai thako, arau amara ocarate'i tomalokara ubhati ahiba lagiba.

21|36|Arau yisakale kupharai karae sihamte yetiya tomaka dekhe tetiya sihamte kerala tomaka upahasara patra hicapehe grahana karae. Sihamte kaya, ‘e'omrae'i se'ijana neki, yiye tomalokara upasyaboraka lai samalocana karae’?, Athaca sihamte'i rahamanara alocanara biraodhita karae.
21|37|Manuhaka srstiye karaa haiche kharadhara praranatarae, atisighrae ma'i sihamtaka mora nidarsanarali dekhuraama; seye tomaloke kharakheda nakaraiba.
21|38|Arau sihamte kaya, ‘yadi tomaloke satyabadi horaa tente koraa e'i pratisrauti ketiya purna ha’ba’

21|39|yadi kaphirasakale se'i samayara katha janilehemtena, yetiya sihamte sihamtara mukhamandala arau pithira paraa ju'i pratiraodha karaiba noraaraiba arau sihamtaka sahaya'o karaa naha’ba (tente sihamte se'i sastika kharakhedakai nibicarailehemtena).
21|40|Baram seya sihamtara oparata akasmikabharae ahiba arau sihamtaka hatabhamba karai diba. Phalata sihamte seya raodha karaiba noraaraiba arau sihamtaka arakaso diya naha’ba.
21|41|Tomara purbe'o bahu raachulara lagata thatraa-bidraupa karaa haichila, parainamata sihamte yi bisaye thatraa-bidraupa karaichila se'itorae sihamtaka paraibestana karai laichila.
21|42|Koraa, ‘raatite ha'omka ba dinate ha'omka rahamanara paraa kone tomalokaka raksa karaiba’? Tathapi'o sihamte nija pratipalakara smaranara paraa mukha ghuraa'i laya.

21|43|Tente sihamtara enekuraa'o kichumana ilaha ache neki yiborae amara paraa sihamtaka raksa karaiba parae? Ihamte dekhuna nijake'i sahaya karaiba noraarae arau amara sastira paraa raksa pabalaiyo sihamte kono asrayadanakarai napaba.

21|44|Baram amiye'i sihamtaka arau sihamtara pitr-purausasakalaka bhoga-sambhara dana karaichilo, lagate sihamtara ayu kala'o achila dighaliya. Sihamte dekha na'ine ye, ami prthiraikhanaka carai'ophalara paraa sankucita karai ani acho. Tathapi'o sihamte'i bijayi ha’bane
21|45|koraa, ‘ma'i kerala ahira dbaraahe tomalokaka satarka karao’; kintu yisakala badhira sihamtaka yetiya satarka karaa haya tetiya sihamte se'i ahbana nusune.
21|46|Arau tomara pratipalakara sastira akanamano yadi sihamtaka sparsa karae tente arasye sihamte kai uthiba, ‘haya! Durbhagya amara, niscaya ami yalima achilo

21|47|arau kiyamatara dina ami n'yayabicarara tulacani sthapana karaima, seye karao prati kono dharanara an'yaya karaa naha’ba arau amala yadi sasya dana paraimana ojanarao haya tathapi'o ami seya upasthita karaima; arau hicapa grahanakarairaupe amiye'i yathesta.
21|48|Arasye ami mucha arau haraunaka dana karaichilo phurakbana, yito muttakbisakalara babe jyoti arau upadesa
21|49|yisakale nedekhakaiye te'omlokara pratipalakaka bhaya karae arau te'omloke kiyamata samparke bhita-santrasta.
21|50|Arau e'ito haiche barakatamaya upadesa, yito ami aratirna karaicho. Tathapi'o tomaloke iyaka asbikara karaibane
21|51|arau ami iyara agata ibraahimaka subhabud'dhi arau sathika jnana dana karaichilo arau ami te'omra bisaye achilo samyaka paraijnata.
21|52|Yetiya te'om te'omra pitrka arau nija sampradayaka ka’le, ‘e'i murtibora ki, yiborara pujata tomaloka asakta haicha!’
21|53|Sihamte ka’le, ‘ami amara pitr-purausasakalaka e'iborara ibadata karaote dekhicho’.
21|54|Te'om ka’le, ‘arasye tomaloke arau tomalokara pitr-purausasakale'o spasta bibhraantita acha’.
21|55|Sihamte ka’le, ‘tumi amara ocarata satya lai ahicha neki, ne tumi amara lagata dhemali karaicha
21|56|te'om ka’le, ‘baram tomalokara raba se'ijane'i yijana akasasamuha arau prthiraira raba, yiye e'ibora srsti karaiche, arau e'i bisaye ma'i an'yatama saksi’.
21|57|‘Arau allahara sapata! Tomaloke guci yoraara pichata ma'i tomalokara murtiborara bisaye arasye kausala aralambana karaima’.
21|58|Tara pichata te'om murtisamuha curna-bicurna karai dile kerala danara murtitora bahirae; yate sihamte tara ocaralai ubhati yaya.
21|59|Sihamte ka’le, ‘amara upasyaborara saite kone e'i kama karaiche? Si niscaya an'yatama yalima’.
21|60|Kichumane ka’le, ‘ami ejana yurakaka e'iborara samalocana karaote sunicho; yaka ibraahima buli koraa haya’.
21|61|Sihamte ka’le, ‘teneha’le taka jana sanmukhata upasthita karaa, yate sihamte saksya haya’.
21|62|Sihamte ka’le, ‘he ibraahima! Tumiye amara upasyaborara saite e'i kama karaicha neki’
21|63|te'om ka’le, ‘baram ihamtara e'i pradhanajane'i kijani e'i kama karaiche, eteke e'iboraka sudhi coraa, yadi ihamta katha ka’ba parae’.
21|64|Tetiya sihamte nije'i punara bibecana karai dekhile arau ijane sijanaka ka’le, ‘niscaya tomaloke'i acala an'yayakarai’.
21|65|Tara pichata sihamtara sira nata ha’la arau ka’le, ‘tumi dekhuna jana'i ye, ihamte katha kaba noraarae’.
21|66|Te'om ka’le, ‘teneha’le tomaloke allahara paraibarte ene bastura ibadata karaa neki yitorae tomalokara kono upakara karaiba noraarae arau apakarao karaiba noraarae
21|67|‘dhika tomalokara prati arau allahara paraibarte tomaloke yiborara ibadata karaa se'iborara prati! Tathapi'o tomaloke nubujane’
21|68|sihamte ka’le, ‘yadi tomaloke kiba karaiba bicaraa tente iyaka ju'ita purai marai peloraa arau tomalokara upasyaborara sahaya karaa’.
21|69|Ami ka’lo, ‘he ju'i! Tumi ibraahimara babe sitala arau niraapada hai yoraa’.
21|70|Arau sihamte te'omra ksati sadhana karaara iccha karaichila. Kintu ami sihamtake'i bechi ksatigrasta karai dilo.
21|71|Arau ami te'omka arau lutaka ud'dhara karai lai ga’lo se'i desata, ya’ta srsti jagatara babe ami kalyana raakhicho.
21|72|Arau ami te'omka (ibraahimaka) dana karaichilo ichahakba lagate atiraikta puraskarasbaraupe dana karaichilo iyakubaka; arau pratyekake karaichilo satkarmaparaayana.

21|73|Arau ami te'omlokaka netrtba dana karaichilo, te'omloke amara nirdesa anusarae manuhaka sathika patha dekhuraa'ichila; arau ami te'omlokaka satkarma karaibalai, chalata kayema karaibalai arau yakata pradana karaibalai ahi praerana karaichilo; arau te'omloka amarae'i ibadatakarai achila.

21|74|Arau lutaka ami dana karaichilo prajna arau jnana, arau te'omka ami ud'dhara karaichilo ene eta janapadara paraa yara adhibasibilaka lipta achila aslila kamata; niscaya sihamta achila eta beya phachikba sampradaya.
21|75|Arau te'omka ami amara anugrahara antarbhukta karaichilo; te'om achila satkarmaparaayana sakalara an'yatama.

21|76|Arau smarana karaa nuhara katha; itipurbe te'om yetiya ahbana karaichila tetiya ami te'omra ahbanata samharai dichilo arau te'omra lagate te'omra paraiyalabargako mahasankatara paraa ud'dhara karaichilo

21|77|Arau ami te'omka sahaya karaichilo se'i sampradayara biraud'dhe yisakale amara nidarsanaralika asbikara karaichila; niscaya sihamta achila eta phachikba sampradaya. E'i karane'i ami sihamta ata'ike duba'i maraichilo.

21|78|Lagate smarana karaa da'uda arau chula'imanaka, yetiya te'omloke sasyaksetra samparke bicara karaichila; yi sasyaksetrata raati manuhara bheraa-chagali praraesa karaichila; arau ami te'omlokara bicara paryabeksana karai achilo.

21|79|Eteke ami chula'imanaka e'i bisayara mimansa buja'i dichilo arau te'omloka duyoke prajna arau jnana dana karaichilo, lagate parbata arau caraa'iboraka ami da'udara anugata karai dichilo, se'iborae te'omra lagata paraitrata arau mahima ghosana karaichila; arau amiye'i achilo e'iborara karta.
21|80|Arau ami te'omka tomalokara babe'i barma nirmanara siksa dichilo, yate i yud'dhata tomalokaka raksa karae; gatike tomaloke krtajna ha’ba ne

21|81|arau prabala bayuka chula'imanara basibhuta karai dichilo; yito te'omra nirdesata prabahita haichila se'i desara pine yi desata ami prabhuta kalyana raakhi thaicho; arau pratyeka bisaya samparke amiye'i samyaka jnani.

21|82|Arau cayatanasakalara majara paraa'o (kichumanaka te'omra basibhuta karaichilo), sihamte te'omra babe dubaraura kama karaichila, iyara bahirae'o bhina bhina kama karaichila; arau amiye'i sihamtara raksakarai achilo.
21|83|Arau smarana karaa a'iyubaka, yetiya te'om nija pratipalakaka ahbana karai kaichila, ‘niscaya ma'i dukha-kastata patita haicho, arau tumi sarbasraestha dayalu’.

21|84|Phalata ami te'omra ahbanata samharai dilo, te'omra dukha-kasta dura karai dilo, te'omka te'omra paraiyalabarga ghuraa'i dilo arau pradana karailo te'omlokara lagate te'omlokara samaparaimana, amara phalara paraa bisesa rahamatasbaraupe arau ibadatakarai sakalara babe upadesasbaraupa.
21|85|Arau smarana karaa ichama'ila, idaraicha arau jula-kiphlaka, te'omlokara pratyeke'i achila dhairyasila
21|86|Arau ami te'omlokaka amara anugrahara antarbhukta karaichilo. Niscaya te'omloka achila satkarmaparaayana.

21|87|Arau smarana karaa juna-nunaka, yetiya te'om kraodha arasthata guci gaichila arau dharana karaichila ye, ami te'omka nadharaima. Tara pichata te'om andhakarara paraa ahbana karai kaichila ye, ‘tomara bahirae ana kono satya ilaha na'i, tumi paraitra mahana, niscaya ma'i an'yaya karaichilo’.
21|88|Phalata ami te'omra ahbanata samharai dichilo arau te'omka duscintara paraa ud'dhara karaichilo, arau e'idarae'i ami muminasakalaka ud'dhara karao.
21|89|Arau smarana karaa yakaraiyyaka, yetiya te'om nija pratipalakaka ahbana karai kaichila, ‘he mora raba! Moka akalasaraiyakai (nihsantana) naraakhiba, tumiye'ito sraestha uttaraadhikarai’.

21|90|Phalata ami te'omra ahbanata samharai dichilo arau te'omka dana karaichilo iyaha'iya, arau te'omra babe te'omra straika (garbhadharanara) yogya karaichilo. Te'omloke satkarmata pratiyogita karaichila, lagate te'omloke amaka agraha arau bhitira saite ahbana karaichila arau te'omloka amara prati binita achila.

21|91|Arau smarana karaa se'ijani naraika, yiye nija lajjasthanara hiphajata karaichila, seye tara majata ami amara rauha phuraa'i dilo. Te'omka arau te'omra putraka srstijagatara babe eta nidarsana bana'i dilo.
21|92|Niscaya tomalokara e'i jati prakrtate eta'i jati arau maye'i tomalokara raba, eteke tomaloke kerala morae'i ibadata karaa.
21|93|Kintu sihamte nijara karyakalapara majata bibheda srsti karaiche. Pratyeke'i amara ocarata pratyarartanakarai.
21|94|Eteke yadi konoba'i mumina hai satkarma karae tente tara pracesta ketiya'o asbikara karaa naha’ba arau niscaya ami iyara lipibad'dhakarai.
21|95|Arau ami yi janapadaka dhbansa karaicho tara babe nisedhajna ache ye, niscaya tara adhibasisakale ketiya'o ghurai nahiba
21|96|Arasesata yetiya iya’juja arau ma’jujaka mukti diya ha’ba arau sihamte pratito uccabhumira paraa daurai ahiba.

21|97|Arau amogha pratisrauta samaya nikatararti ha’le akasmikabharae kaphirasakalara caku sthira hai yaba, sihamte ka’ba, ‘haya! Durbhagya amara! Arasye ami e'i bisaye udasina achilo; baram ami achilo yalima’.
21|98|Niscaya tomaloke arau allahara paraibarte tomaloke yiborara ibadata karaa se'i sakalobora haiche jahannamara indhana; tomaloka ataye tata praraesa karaiba.
21|99|Yadi sihamta ilaha ha’lehemtena tente sihamta jahannamata praraesa nakarailehemtena; arau sihamta ataye tata sthayi ha’ba
21|100|tata thakiba sihamtara cinamra-bakhara arau artanada, se'i karane sihamte tata ekorae suna napaba
21|101|niscaya amara taraphara paraa yisakalara babe purbarae paraa kalyana nirdharaita ache te'omlokaka iyara paraa amtarata rakha ha’ba.
21|102|Te'omloke jahannamara ksina sabda'o suna napaba, arau tata te'omloke manahputa bastura majata cirakala thakiba.
21|103|Mahabhitiye'o te'omlokaka cintita nakaraiba arau phiraistasakale te'omlokaka abhyarthana karaiba e'i buli, ‘e'itorae tomalokara se'i dina, yara pratisrauti tomalokaka diya haichila’.

21|104|Se'idina ami akasasamuhaka meraiya'i pelama, yenekai merai'oraa haya likhita dalila-patra. Yidarae ami prathame srstira sucana karaichilo se'idarae punara srsti karaima; e'ito amara krta pratisrauti, niscaya ami seya palana karaime'i.
21|105|Arau arasye ami ‘yikara’ra pichata yaburata likhi dicho ye, ‘kerala mora yogya bandasakale'i prthiraira uttaraadhikarai ha’ba’.
21|106|Niscaya iyata ache ibadatakarai sampradayara babe paryapta bisayabastu.
21|107|Arau ami tomaka bisbabasira babe kerala rahamata hicapehe praerana karaicho.
21|108|Koraa, ‘mora prati ahi karaa haya ye, tomalokara ilaha kerala ekaka ilaha. Eteke tomaloke atmasamarpanakarai ha’bane?’

21|109|Tathapi'o yadi sihamte mukha ghuraa'i laya tente tumi kai diya, ‘ma'i tomalokaka yathayathabharae jana'i dicho arau tomalokaka yi bisayara pratisrauti diya haiche, ma'i najano seya nikatararti ne durararti.
21|110|‘Niscaya te'om prakasya katha samparke'o jane arau tomaloke yi gopana karaa seya'o jane.
21|111|‘Arau ma'i najano hayato e'ito (bilamba) tomalokara babe eta paraiksa arau kichusamayara babe jiranopabhogara suyoga’.

21|112|Raachule kaichila, ‘he mora raba! Tumi n'yayasangatabharae phayacala karai diya’, arau amara raba haiche dayamaya, tomaloke yi sabyasta karaicha se'i bisaye ekamatra sahayasthala kerala teraemi’.
